title: People Operations Coordinator
description: Are you convinced that decisions in organizations must be based on solid and reliable data Do you have a knack for documenting processes Does it drive you crazy when data is inaccurate and unreliable About This Opportunity Popmenu is looking for a detailoriented People Operations Coordinator as passionate about data as they are about the people who use them in their daily work Our ideal candidate is also very detailoriented so lets talk about some of the details What You Will be Responsible for Data Integrity The People Operations Coordinator takes full ownership of ensuring that our people data and compensation structure is accurate and up to date That includes everything from entering data into the system processing changes to running frequent validity checks and audits Process Documentation and Execution Our People Operations Coordinator is excited about documenting processes and ensure they are being followed across departments Whether its sending out accurate offer letters processing employment verifications handling promotions or documenting terminations  they make sure nothing falls through the cracks Dashboards  Reporting Our People Operations Coordinator manages all our reporting and dashboard needs to help us drive accountability and datadriven decisions throughout the organization From creating new dashboards based on business needs and digging your teeth into complex data sets to simply running reports that our stakeholders are expecting on and ongoing basis  there is a lot to do Timely Payroll Insurance Enrollment  State Reporting Never mess with peoples money Our People Operations Coordinator will ensure that our semimonthly payroll is always accurate and that all state registrations are set up for proper employment tax reporting They investigate and solve state tax compliance issues manage insurance registration requirements and stay on top of state letters Employee Experience From planning and executing employee appreciation events and activities to coordinating new employee onboarding making last minute changes to orders for the office meeting regularly with team members and being aware of what is going on in their lives our People Operations Coordinator understands the impact of behind the scenes functions and is passionate about creating an effortless positive employee experience Adhoc projects In a startup we never run out of opportunities to improve processes or systems Our People Operations Coordinator is excited to be involved in a variety of confidential projects system implementations or other strategic projects that help us take Popmenu to the next level Keep the office running You will make sure our office on both floors stays stocked up with supplies and stays in shipshape This role will be in office at least 2 days per week What You Bring to the Table Utmost professionalism and integrity  You will have access to highly confidential information and you need to be able to keep a lot of things to yourself Innate curiosity with a problem solving mindset  you want to know the why then constantly make improvements and try new things Demonstrated ability to selfcheck your work  you need to have the urge to double and triple check everything you do for you to enjoy this role Solid Microsoft Excel skills required  its a lot of data to manage Proven ability to manage multiple activities of varying complexity while prioritizing and focusing on critical tasks and issues You will have a lot of competing priorities in this role Excellent interpersonalcustomer relations skills clear and concise verbal and written communicator At Popmenu we believe in transparency and meeting candidates at eye level We know that money isnt everything  but it is important For this role we have determined a compensation range of 55k60k base in addition to company equity to be a fair and attractive offer We would love the opportunity to meet you and learn more about you and your background and final offer amounts are determined by multiple factors and may vary from the amount above Looking forward to chatting with you Additional Information Who We Are Popmenu is a fastgrowing venturebacked SaaS company in the restauranthospitality sector with more than 10000 restaurant clients We are dedicated to revolutionizing the industry in a way that benefits both the restaurant owner and their customers We started with our nowpatented dynamic menu technology that unleashes the power of a restaurants greatest marketing tool the menu Since then we have been endlessly innovating to continue tackling existing and emerging industry needs We hire exceptionally bright motivated people who are passionate about helping great restaurants reach their full potential We offer a flexible work environment a pioneering concept a product our clients love and talented teammates This is a chance to make great things happen and be a difference maker Were excited to meet you What Were Serving  Genuine Core ValuesWe asked our employees whats most important to them in the workplace and carefully sculpted our 4 core values to truly represent our company culture Were proud that our culture has been recognized with several awards includingGlassdoors Best Places to WorkandTop Workplaces USA Were even prouder that peers recognize each other on a monthly basis for exemplifying our values with what we call Super Booms  Giving BackIn addition to our larger partners such as theGiving Kitchen our culture champions aka monthly Super Boom winners pick a cause they are passionate about and well make a donation in their name  Visible Growth and DevelopmentThere is no way to avoid personal growth in a startup We keep innovating and improving and our team members keep growing as well Just in the last year 1 out of 5 team members has been promoted into a new role  Company OwnershipWhen we say Act Like an Owner we put our money where our mouth is Every single team member receives meaningful company equity options because we recognize that every role is important for our success  Benefits for the Whole FamilyAlong with the typical medical dental vision 401K benefits weve got your furry family members covered with our Wagmo Wellness Plan See more

title: Bioinformatics Scientist, Solid Tumor DNA Oncology
description: Passionate about precision medicine and advancing the healthcare industry Recent advancements in underlying technology have finally made it possible for AI to impact clinical care in a meaningful way Tempus proprietary platform connects an entire ecosystem of realworld evidence to deliver realtime actionable insights to physicians providing critical information about the right treatments for the right patients at the right time We are seeking a highly motivated and capable bioinformatics scientist with experience and interest in translational cancer research and clinical genomics This position requires experience with scientific programming relational data systems algorithms development and statistical modeling Top candidates will also have experience deploying bioinformatics code within a clinical setting Duties and Responsibilities Develop and optimize algorithms used to gain insight into cancer variation through analysis of next generation sequencing data Design and conduct analysis to evaluate improvements in variant calling classification data modeling and analysis systems Validate oncology assays to orthogonal methods Collaborate with scientists and clinicians to design and perform analyses on cancer clinical sequencing data in order to improve quality of care Work in interdisciplinary groups of scientists engineers and product developers to translate research into clinically actionable insights for our clients Produce high quality and detailed documentation for all projects Preferred Qualifications A completed PhD in Cancer Biology or Molecular Biology related to cancer or relevant experience Computational skills using Python R andor Bioconductor Ideal candidates will possess Experience in cancer genetics Experience working with nextgeneration sequencing data Experience using workflow languages such as CWL andor WDL Experience using cloud systems such as AWS Azure andor GCP Selfdriven and works well in interdisciplinary teams Experience with communicating insights and presenting concepts to a diverse audience Background in predictive or prognostic algorithm development LIEH1 LIHybrid LIRemote We are an equal opportunity employer We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status See more

title: Data Product Manager

ability to draw datadriven business insights Bachelors or Masters degree in Business Administration Economy Engineering or Computer Science Advanced English Experience working on global companies or title: Revenue Optimization Specialist - Hotels

Experience in Brazil market Bachelors degree in tourism hospitality customer success account management or similar Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM Knowledge of SQL Tableau or similar data Strong organizational skills and attention to detail No ego Strong focus on doing what is right for the customer and the company An ideal candidate has Previous experience with lead roles will be an prioritization logic datadriven decisionmaking no bias Balance of commercial and data skills are highly valued Hoppers mission Desire to evangelize Hoppers message throughout the world Perks of working with us Wellfunded and proven startup with large ambitions competitive salary quarterly performance bonus etc Unlimited PTO WeWork All Access Pass OR Workfromhome stipend Entrepreneurial culture where pushing limits and taking risks is everyday business Open communication with management and company leadership Small dynamic teams  massive impact Additional Information More about Hopper At Hopper we are on a mission to become the worlds best  and most fun  place to book travel By leveraging massive amounts of data advanced machine learning algorithms Hopper combines its worldclass travel agency offering with proprietary fintech products to help customers spend less and travel better Ranked the third largest online travel agency in North America the app has been downloaded over 100 million times and continues to gain market share globally Here are just a few stats that demonstrate the companys recent growth Hopper sells 6 billion worth of travel and travel fintech every year 2022 sales were up 3X over 2021 In 2022 Hopper increased its revenue 25X yearover year The companys bespoke fintech products such as Flight Disruption Guarantee and Price Freeze now represent around 50 of Hoppers total app revenue Given the success of its fintech products Hopper launched a B2B initiative called Hopper Cloud in late 2021 Through this partnership program any travel provider airlines hotels banks travel agencies etc can integrate and seamlessly distribute Hoppers fintech or travel inventory As its first Hopper Cloud partnership Hopper partnered with Capital One to codevelop Capital One Travel a new travel portal designed specifically for cardholders Other partners include Marriott Uber Agoda CommBank and many more to be announced Hopper Cloud now comprises more than 50 of Hoppers business Hopper Cloud made around as much in 2022 as all of the Hopper app did in 2021 Recognized as one of the worlds most innovative companies by Fast Company four years in a row Hopper has been downloaded over 100 million times and continues to have millions of new installs each month Hopper is now the 3 largest online travel agency in North America Hopper has raised over 750 million USD of private capital and is backed by some of the largest institutional investors and banks in the world Hopper is primed to continue its acceleration as the worlds fastestgrowing mobilefirst travel marketplace Come take off with us See more

title: Director, Finance Business Partner
description: Who are we Smarsh empowers its customers to manage risk and unleash intelligence in their digital communications Our growing community of over 6500 organizations in regulated industries American companies since 2008 SummaryObjective As the Director Finance Business Partner you will serve as the primary contact for financial performance for assigned business functions You will develop organizationally align distribute and lead discussions on critical metrics to drive visibility and accountability throughout the organization You will be an inspirational leader who conveys energy and Streamline systems and data to identify measure effectively and track key performance indicators KPIs Ensures alignment between revenue projections and associated spend for business function Manage headcount and staffing plans to ensure both functional objectives are met and within budget Support vendor negotiations and cost management for software hosting and hardware Manage monthly forecasts and annual budget through an inclusive process with the functional management team Oversees variance commentary and analysis of the business function against complete PL and leading indicators Works with other Finance Business Partners Corporate FPA and Accounting to disseminate and receive relevant information throughout the organization Support cost optimization projects through profitability analysis and efficiency recommendations Able to present complex information and findings to large teams Moderate understanding of GAAP and impact on financial forecasts Other duties as assigned What will you bring Bachelors degree in Finance Accounting or Business MBA CPA or Masters preferred 10 years of financial analysis experience preferably in SAAS or Professional Services Experience with Workday Adaptive Planning Salesforce or NetSuite preferred Can apply advanced knowledge and experience to developing new methods programs and procedures and includes a comprehensive understanding of the practical issues of at least one central functional area where the knowledge is applied Skilled in endtoend people management Can drive the application of principles theories and concepts and determines the best course of action Able to resolve complex problems of line of businesswide operations Skilled in establishing functional procedures and policy Can identify efficiency improvement activities and work to implement streamliningefficiency changes Can make tactical decisions that will impact the line of business What do we offer Healthcare insurance  We provide medical dental and vision insurance and a flexible spending account that allows you to set aside pretax dollars to pay for eligible outofpocket expenses Personal time off  A healthy worklife balance is critical to your success at the office Smarsh offers a takewhatyouneed time off policy as well as flexible work arrangements 401K Match  Smarsh provides a 4 401K match for which employees are fully vested on day one Sabbatical  The Smarsh sabbatical program provides a time to recharge to study or simply a time to do something you are passionate about away from the workplace Employees are eligible after six years of service Recognition  Were big on kudos for a job well done Our employeerecognition program enables coworkers to nominate their peers who best embody our core values for recognition The above salary range represents Smarshs good faith and reasonable estimate of the range of possible base compensation at the time of posting Any applicable bonus programs will be discussed during the recruiting process The salary for this role will be set based on a variety of factors including but not limited to internal equity experience education location specialty and training Local cost of living assessments are done for each new hire at the time of offer Additional Information Smarsh is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to their race colour religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability or status as a protected veteran Smarsh invites all qualified and interested applicants to apply for career opportunities Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform essential functions including the frequency of functions About our culture Smarsh hires lifelong learners with a passion for innovating with purpose humility and humor Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do We work closely with the most popular communications platforms and the worlds leading cloud infrastructure platforms We use the latest in AIML technology to help our customers break new ground at scale We are a global organization that values diversity and we believe that providing opportunities for everyone to be their authentic self is key to our success Smarsh leadership culture and commitment to developing our people have all garnered Comparablycom Best Places to Work Awards Come join us and find out what the best work of your career looks like See more

title: Customer Engineer
description: Customer Engineer North America  Remote  LIRemote  Work from Home Why you The Customer Engineer plays a critical role in the following five key areas of responsibility  Technical Sales Engagement opportunity discovery  Customer Relationship Development  Partner Alignment  Technical Relationship Development  LOBOffering and Portfolio Expansion within Account Base  Customer Success holistically Key Measures of Success  New opportunities discovered clients prospects and partners What will you be doing Technical Sales Engagement As assigned by sales leadership engages with targeted customer organizations Understands customer business and establishes technical and business credibility with clients providing the ability to cultivate relationships and envision creative sales and solution strategies that generate additional revenue Participates with Solution Architect as needed in holistic solutions from both business and technical perspective across all Lines of Business LOBs taking into account all realities and constraints such as costs contract terms business conditions and the technical environment of the client Organizes and leads technical customer needs identification and scoping calls including ensuring participation of relevant LOB resources Participates with the Solution Architect in the creation of customer specific services and technology solutions to include coordinating a team of line of business solutions delivery and PM resources integrating partner technology and teams and owns the production of the client facing SoW Delivers and sells the technical solution strategy and vision to senior client executives ensuring the solution embodies company win themes and key differentiators while meeting client expectations and requirements thereby providing the company the best chance to compete and win Customer Relationship Development Creates and cultivates key trustedadvisor relationships with senior level IT executives demonstrating an understanding of key business challenges within customer markets and how company technologyenabled business solutions can address those needs Provides leadership to help customers understand best practices around advanced cloudbased data and application solutions and how to migrate existing workloads to the cloud including modernization and transformation of applications data platforms and analytics solutions Leverages public and private cloud technologies to continuously find ways to solve customer needs and advise customers on technology standards methodologies and processes as they relate to their infrastructure data and applications estate Own the technical services and architecture agenda for named customers and drive the account innovation component for QBRs and other key customer engagements Partner Alignment  Technical Relationship Management Build and maintain relationships with partner presales solutions and customer engineers Maintain and add continually add individual partner technical certifications and support the achievement of corporate specializations and program inclusions Conduct joint technical strategy sessions with partner engineers and engagement managers LOBOffering and Portfolio Expansion within Account Base Provides feedback of customerprospectpartner interactions on offerings relationship delivery and competitive knowledge Provides recommendations to offering organization on new offerings upgradesaugmentation to enhance corporate competency in meeting the needs of customers Participation with introducing new offerings to our customers and building a technical roadmap for Portfolio Expansion within each customer Customer Success and Technical Escalation Build a strong relationship with our architects engineers and project managers rolling up your sleeves and going deep technically as you work through the details of a particular solution or client challenge Act as a point of technical consultation for both client and partner contacts Work to ensure the customer is highly satisfied with all solutions delivered and is a referenceable customer What do we need from you While we realize you might not have everything on the list to be the successful candidate for the Customer Engineer job you will likely have prior experience as a Data Architect or Cloud Solutions Architect and specialized knowledge and experience in the following Excellent knowledge of the business of Data management  Data lifecycle A strong understanding and experience with Cloud architectures specifically Google Cloud Platform GCP Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services AWS with a focus on the data services Indepth knowledge of popular database and data warehouse technologies from Microsoft Amazon andor Google Big Data  Conventional RDBMS Microsoft Azure SQL Data Warehouse Teradata Redshift BigQuery Snowflake etc Good understanding of conventional databases Oracle SQL Server MySQL Postgres etc Experience moving data to cloud and designing cloud based data warehousesarchitectures Writing and specing out data pipelines Knowledge of cloud based ingestion and transformation tools Prior experience in a technical sales environment Consulting experience  Management experience would be nice to have A certification such as Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect Google Professional Data Engineer or related AWS Certified Solutions Architect  Big Data or Microsoft Azure Architect would also be great Additional Information Why Pythian Pythian excels at helping businesses use their data and cloud to transform how they compete and win in this everchanging environment by delivering advanced onprem hybrid cloud and multicloud solutions to solve the toughest data challenges faster and better than anyone else Founded and headquartered in Ottawa Canada in 1997 Pythian now has more than 370 employees located around the globe with over 350 clients spanning industries from SaaS media gaming financial services ecommerce and more Pythian is known for its technologyenabled data expertise covering everything from ETL to ML We pride ourselves on our ability to deliver innovative solutions that meet the specific data goals of each client and have built meaningful partnerships with major cloud vendors AWS Google and Microsoft The powerful combination of our extensive expertise in data and cloud and our ability to keep on top of the latest bleeding edge technologies make us the perfect partner to help mid and largesized businesses transform to stay ahead in todays rapidly changing digital economy If you are Partner Marketing Manager live in the US love your data and want to love your career then join us Disclaimer For this job an equivalent combination of education and experience which results in demonstrated ability to apply skills will also be considered Pythian is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from people with disabilities Accommodations are available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process The successful applicant will need to fulfill the requirements necessary to obtain a background check Applicants must be legally authorized to work in their country of residence permanently Pythian will not relocate sponsor or file petitions of any kind on behalf of a foreign worker to gain a work visa become a permanent resident based on a permanent job offer or to otherwise obtain authorization to work Love Your Data is a registered trademark of Pythian Services Inc INR values are approximate title: Marketing Specialist
description: Kyruus mission is to connect people to the right care in pursuit of our visiona better healthcare system one thats transparent and accessible where everyone gets the care they need At Kyruus our values are at the heart of everything we do We care deeply  We do the right thing even if its the harder thing We are fiercely driven We harness our curiosity to pursue continuous improvement and create simple solutions to complex problems We lead with respect  We celebrate the individual traits that make each of us unique and seek out diverse voices to listen and learn We are accountable  We do what we promise for each other and our customers Heres what that would mean for you in the Marketing Specialist roleCare you care about our team and customers diving deep to understand best practices identifying differentiators and white space for new ideas to expand the Kyruus brandDrive You are selfmotivated and have a relentless focus on internal education and enablement of the broader Kyruus commercial and delivery functionsRespect you support and engage with crossfunctional teams creating synergies and providing sound insight into Marketing data resources tools and initiativesAccountable you are an integral part of the team holding yourself and others to a highstandard while not letting perfection be the enemy of progress What you will do in the Marketing Specialist role at Kyruus Youll assist Marketing leadership and broader marketing team by supporting or owning measurement of various projects and performance and propose prioritize and execute on delivery process improvement initiatives Youll help ensure team members have necessary support and information to meet deadlines and milestones for various marketing initiatives and projects Youll communicate between various teams internally setting times and dates for meetings to keep on schedule and relay any issues to management eg progress reports issues with timelines etc Youll support project management and tactical execution of the Annual Thought Leadership on Access Symposium ATLAS conference and other events Youll proactively support budget tracking including proper organization of documentation around spend and communicate any efficiencies savings or issues as they arise Youll help maintain inventory of marketing materials and files ensuring all are current and accurate and coordinate the creation of new materials or organization when necessary Youll support and help coordinate pre and postevent webinar andor other marketing tactic outreach as well as proper lead routing Youll assist with website updates utilizing our Wordpress environment for landing page creation adding assets  content to the website as well as posting blogs press releases etc Youll help to edit the Marketing Confluence pages keeping them uptodateYoull assist in sending standardized email communications via HubSpot Youll regularly leverage Hubspot Salesforce Asana Slack and other enablement and field marketing tools Youll report to the Director Trade Shows  Events within the Marketing function How Youll Use Your Professional Skills Youll use your 3 years of experience in event and general marketing to Demonstrate an understanding of basic marketing functions and objectives as well as critical thinking abilities to effectively get the job done Help solve problems within several environments and contexts eg different sized organizations colocateddistributed teams new product development etc Create strong working relationships at all levels Successfully support coordination and completion of multiple projects simultaneously while working autonomously Make sound decisions with urgency while proactively seeking advice andor guidance when needed How Youll Know Youre Succeeding You demonstrate success in the delivery of various team needs and assist in keeping projects on schedule You successfully communicate andor collaborate with key business partners and stakeholders across the business You are clearly able to define and drive deadlines side by side with management and other team members Youve successfully helped plan direct coordinate complete and report on marketing activities and prove ROI Youve supported process development and efficiencies for the Marketing team Where Youll Go From Here Kyruuvians in the Marketing Specialist role can move in a more linear career path to a Senior Marketing Specialist position overseeing larger initiatives and process and from there into a possible managerlevel position Kyruus also loves to see an internal transfer If a linear career path is not what youre looking for you can work with your manager and HR to explore lateral moves to other parts of the organization as you continue to grow with us Additional Information Equal Opportunity Employer Kyruus is dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities EEO to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex gender national origin citizenship age disability sexual orientation genetic information We will not discriminate in any employment decision against any individual or group on the basis of race color religion sex gender national origin citizenship age disability sexual orientation genetic information or veteransnational guardmilitary reserve status This shall be done in compliance with all applicable federal state and local laws in every location in which Kyruus has facilities See more

title: Sales Development Manager
description: Are you known for your high energy and ability to inspire your sales team to achieve greatness If youre an overachiever who enjoys delivering exceptional results and wants to help build our business this is an outstanding job opportunity for you About Us ChowNows vision is to become the leading North American platform connecting diners and independent restaurants for athome dining The ChowNow Platform continues to grow its product offerings and bring restaurants and diners closer together Our marketplace provides a commissionfree ordering for restaurants nationwide and diners with an evergrowing selection of independent restaurants Our demand network provides diners with the ability to order where theyre already online including Google Yelp Instagram Snap and many others And our whitelabeled online ordering system provides restaurants with a branded experience for diners on their website and their own iOS and Android apps for a reasonable monthly fee regardless of order volume To date weve created over 20000 apps for our restaurant partners  something thats never been done before in our category We operate this way because of our belief in being fair sustainable and equitable with our restaurant partners and the same goes for our culture Diversity teamwork and mutual respect are among our core company values We pride ourselves on giving our teams plenty of opportunities to make their mark Join us and help ensure ChowNow becomes the diners first choice for socially responsible online ordering Together we can preserve neighborhood flavor one restaurant at a time About the Position As our Sales Development Manager you will be working with a team of highly motivated Sales Development Representatives and will be responsible for helping them drive results and achieve a higher level of mastery of their roles Your team will focus on generating pipeline for the ChowNow Sales team through calls emails social media text and other sales channels Your team will be responsible for prospecting qualifying engaging and generating meetings with high value restaurants in ChowNow Priority Markets By working at the top of the funnel for our restaurant growth motion your team will aid in increasing ChowNows brand awareness while serving as the first touch point for many restaurants You will be tasked with evolving iterating and strengthening the SDR motion while simultaneously leading a team to achieve their goals In addition to the goal attainment and restaurant growth your team will be responsible for you will manage the career development of your team to help them master their skills and progress through their careers at ChowNow This is a hybrid position based in Los Angeles with a 4 days a week in office requirement Reports to the Director of Outside Sales Senior and will have a team of 48 Sales Development Representatives as direct reports What We Love About You You put restaurants first You deeply understand the importance of local restaurants and put them at the center of everything you do You aim to help them not only survive but thrive You celebrate diversity You recognize that diversity and inclusivity matter Youre committed to progress which means everyone gets the support and resources they need no matter who they are You have an ability to listen to other team members ideas and can thrive in an environment that embraces individuality Everyones voice counts You raise your hand You consistently go above and beyond what is asked of you You help your peers accomplish their tasks while also excelling at accomplishing your own When you have a smart idea you raise your hand and share it You keep reaching You set clear ambitious goals You dont allow yourself to become complacent with where youre at and what youve done so you seek out new opportunities and challenges What Success Looks Like Within 1 Month Youll Establish and run weekly team meetings including 11s with your direct reports  checkins andor checkouts daily Work with Sales Leadership to define rules of engagement and partnership between your organization and the full cycle sellers Partner with B2B Marketing  RevOps to ideate and ship campaigns that drive results in strategic priorities Build  Iterate objection handling cold call scripts and value stories to effectively set meetings Work with DnA  RevOps to build the reports dashboards and tools you will need to manage success for you and your organization Listen to calls of your team to provide a strong feedback loop for improving their skills Lead weekly call reviews to ensure there are checks  balances that drive towards results Execute and train on the ChowNows approach to cold calling Within 3 Months Youll Have diagnosed strengths and weaknesses of your team Partner with Sales Enablement to build ongoing training  curriculum to strengthen your team and improve rate metrics in the sales process Build a pipeline of SDRs to ensure we have a bench as individuals advance through their career path Have an understanding of the ChowNow Value Prop and sales pillars Play a hand in the Extended Sales Leadership Team by providing a feedback loop for the sentiments blockers and successes in the field Within 6 Months Youll Accurately report and forecast team performance to provide insights into opportunities  threats in our goal attainment Ensure your team maintains high standards of data integrity within our Salesforcecom instance resulting in increased levels of connection rates with prospects from our sales and marketing programs Identify team workflow needs and efficiencies to improve our overall sales stack Cultivate a great culture within your team that drives a desire to achieve goals while maintaining a positive and fun atmosphere Within 12 Months Youll Manage a team that is hitting their goals on a consistent basis through the lens of quality and quantity Maintain KPI Key Performance Indicator expectations and pull through Work with the VP of Sales and Sales Directors to outline any goforward opportunities for the Sales Development Organization You should apply if You have 35 years of Sales or related business experience You have 1 years prior experience as a manager in Sales Development You have knowledge of Salesforce  other sales tools Groove Drift RingDNA Chilipier etc Google Docs and Excel You have strong coaching and strategic selling skills  creating a business plan assessing territories qualifying targets and prioritizing sales efforts You have a track record of consistent overachievement strong work ethic and desire to learn Youre genuinely curious about people local restaurants and food trends You subscribe to a work hard stay positive and implement feedback mentality You enjoy a competitive atmosphere where everyone is striving to be better than the day before while celebrating each others wins About Our Benefits Expected base salary 109250  120750 with an ability to earn a commission Ongoing training and growth opportunities A Best Place to Work winner multiple times where we focus on creating a great employee experience Rock solid medical dental and vision plans Mental Health Coverage  we offer several programs to support your mental health and wellness goals 3 weeks paid vacation paid holidays we expect you to work hard but still enjoy your personal life 7 weeks of baby bonding time for all new parents within the first year of birth or adoption 8 Weeks of Paid Pregnancy Leave 401k Matching Employercontributing student loan assistance program or continuing education reimbursement program Commuter benefits including Uber Pool Employee Stock Incentive Plan Pet insurance for your fur babies Quarterly Industry Events Women LGBTQIA Diversity Inclusion Consistent  fair leadership well share info set clear goals show you respect and treat everyone fairly Enough freedom to spread your wings while still holding you accountable Fully stocked kitchen and cold brew on tap in our satellite offices Additional Information The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this job This is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities duties and skills required As one of ChowNows core values Celebrates Diversity we are committed to an inclusive and diverse work environment ChowNow is an equal opportunity employer We do not discriminate based on race color ethnicity ancestry national origin religion sex gender gender identity gender expression sexual orientation age disability veteran status genetic information marital status or any legally protected status Read here about your California privacy rights LiHybrid See more

and qualitative methods and storytelling How Youll Know Youre Succeeding You successfully plan and execute the events strategy for Kyruus in close partnership with marketing sales and broader executive leadership You consistently meet or exceed goals set for events both tradeshows and ATLAS and demonstrate meaningful impact on the Kyruus pipeline through reporting You own marketing and strategizing on tradeshows and conferences that Kyruus attends exhibits or sponsors in order to generate market qualified leads You generate future event opportunities for Kyruus and bring new ideas to the table for expanding the events program andor raising the bar on existing events Youve successfully engaged current customers for speaking opportunities at industry conferences and ATLAS Where title: HR Working Student: Admin and Operations (m/f/d)
description: Come build The Disney of the 21st Century with us  At Inkitt we believe every author should have an equal opportunity to succeed Our mission is to discover hidden talents and turn them into globally successful authors Traditional publishing often leaves authors behind with human editors responsible for selecting books fit for publication Inkitt is a pioneer at the forefront of datadriven publishing By inventing an algorithm which analyzes users reading behavior to identify hits we have removed subjectivity from the traditional publishing equation This gives Inkitt the unique ability to discover hidden talents that might otherwise have gone unnoticed  Are you a builder We are looking for the changemakers of the world the people who build the blueprint anytime they are unsatisfied with the status quo Come build The Disney of the 21st Century with us by developing our books audiobooks creation of games TV shows and movies What youll do Be a part of the People Team and help with HR administrative tasks and operational duties Take care of general HR tasks like office management Help with German documents and be able to translate them Have clear communication in both English and German Who you are Startup hungry you excel in a fastpaced scrappy environment and you welcome new challenges Committed to building an inperson work culture you prefer a hybrid work model Fluent German and English speaker What we offer  Stock options for all fulltime employees We believe everyone deserves a piece of ownership for when we become the Disney of the 21st Century  Newly launched 401k to help you save and invest in your future US  Health benefits that align with your local market offering a variety of different coverages for medical dental and vision  A hybrid model in San Francisco and Berlin offices where 3 days per week are dedicated to inperson collaboration in parallel with remote work  Lunches served in San Francisco Tuesday Wednesday Thursday  Lunches and dinners served in Berlin Tuesday Wednesday Thursday  Professional coaching for People Managers and employees who have been with Inkitt for 2 years  Dedicated budget for teambuilding events  Employee Referral Bonus  Free access to our Galatea App get your read on  Unlimited budget for selfdevelopment books on us  Donation to charity of your choice on your work anniversary  Stocked microkitchens with snacks and drinks to keep you energized  Class Pass health club for US Inkers to feel their best  Berliners gym membership  Berliners virtual assistant  Arguably the best perk Getting to bring your furever friend to our Berlin and San Francisco offices How weve been doing Were a wellfunded missiondriven Series B company with toptier investors like NEA HV Capital and Kleiner Perkins Recently Inkitt has raised 59 million which is one of the largest Series B funding rounds on record for a Berlinbased business We believe we provide authors with a platform that fosters their passion for writing and gives them the chance to be discovered  Were the 8th fastestgrowing company in Europe and 1st in Germany Were excited to share weve signed Entertainment 360 to represent Inkitt and our authors in the world of film and television  Additional Information At Inkitt we strive to build a company culture and provide employment opportunities based on diversity and inclusion We believe every author should have an equal opportunity to succeed as should our team members As a growing team from 20 countries we welcome everyone to apply We look forward to hearing from you Check out our Careers Blog Follow us on Instagram  LinkedIn  See more

description: Say hello to Newton  Canadas first lowcost cryptocurrency trading platform We see a future where financial systems are open to everyone and built to empower people to embrace financial freedom We believe cryptocurrency plays a role in that future so were making it more accessible to Canadians Newton team members are spread out across Canada within a fullyremote capacity How We Work  We are builders who aspire to master our crafts  We deeply care about our teammates and aim to win together We embrace the following values  A strong sense of ownership  Defaulting to action  A continuous learning and growth mindset  High performance and highvelocity output  A supportive respectful and transparent work environment About the Role Newton is looking for a Product Designer to enhance and expand our core product and user experience Design excellence is a fundamental aspect of Newton for our team and users Responsibilities Use Figma to create mockups and explore new product features Extend and work within our design system Interact with users to understand their needs expectations and goals Collaborate closely with engineers to implement your designs Requirements Proven experience as a product designer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work A keen eye for details and a commitment to creating pixelperfect interfaces A desire to design experiences that delight users and turn them into Newton fans Strong communication and presentation skills to convey design concepts and decisions Additional Information At Newton we celebrate our inclusive work environment and welcome members of all backgrounds and perspectives to apply We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations and will work with you to meet your needs If you are a person with a disability and require assistance during the application process please dont hesitate to reach out See more

title: Senior Product Designer (remote)
description: At Yardzen we believe people are at their best when theyre outside We have a simple promisehelp people envision the outdoor spaces of their dreams all online and then match them with the right local contractors to bring their design to life Since our launch in 2018 weve helped thousands of homeowners achieve their dream yards make environmentally responsible decisions boost their property values and get more out of their outdoor spaces We are disrupting the 200 billion outdoor renovation industry By leveraging technology and creating an innovative online process we offer a more straightforward transparent and delightful design and build experience for the modern homeowner Weve been recognized as a Forbes Best Startup Employer Fast Company Most Innovative Company named to Inc Magazines Best Places to Work and written about by Architectural Digest The New York Times Sunset Magazine House Beautiful The Wall Street Journal and Forbes And were just getting started Were looking for a customercentric Senior Product Designer to take Yardzens product experience to the next level Youll design platform experiences that increase customer delight and engagement cultivate innovation and drive value across the customer journey The ideal candidate knows how to align product strategy with human interaction and usability methodologies for different types of audiences customers designers internal team members contractors etc This is a critical crossfunctional role that will have a meaningful impact on the Product team You will work closely with Product Engineering Marketing and Operations and your work will have significant exposure to senior leadership Key Responsibilities Lead product design UX and UI strategy and execution across the customer journey across all digital platforms Work collaboratively to align the product experience with broader business goals growth strategy and brand Be an advocate for our customers and users Be able to have strong opinions about what good UX means and communicate those opinions crossfunctionally effectively Create user flows site maps wireframes visual designs low and highfidelity interactive prototypes for product changes and new functionality Create design systems modules elements and components to ensure consistency throughout the entire customer journey Discuss design ideas and communicate project updates to senior management on a regular basis Partner with engineering in making sure final design files are development ready and can be implemented effectively in code Help define product requirements and specifications with the Product team Help drive engagement and conversion rate improvements and ideate experiments by deeply understanding prospective customer behavior identifying friction Collaborate and prioritize AB tests to measure the impact of your design changes and further optimize performance Conduct usability studies to identify areas throughout the customer journey Test new product concepts and prototypes to validate assumptions and hypotheses Create experiences that are ADA and WCAGcompliant About you 5 years as a high performing Product Designer including experience in D2C andor marketplace platforms Extensive experience communicating design solutions via presentations wireframes clickthrough prototypes and design specifications Expertise in usercentered design principles and best practices for user testing and user research Datadriven and know how to monitor success through analytics and metrics Track record of driving continual improvement via experimentation and AB tests Organized and processoriented with careful attention to detail Appreciation for beautiful design and a strong brand aesthetic Experience working with Figma Great collaborator with excellent communication and presentation skills for both business and engineering teams receptive to feedback Have an online portfolio so you can show us your approach and design work Comfortable being the only Product Designer at Yardzen and excited to be a part of a startup environment Additionally You believe in the benefits of outdoor living Youre energized by playing an important role in driving revenue and having an impact of the business You embrace change and lead with a growth mindset Youre a real teammate and would be described by those who know you as a genuinely kind person Culture is critical in the early days and were looking for goodness and grit Benefits Equity into Yardzen Companysponsored medical dental and vision insurancefor the employee Unlimited PTO  NTO Nature Time Off Paid parental leave Health  wellness stipend Cell phone and internet stipend Home office stipend This compensation range is based on Yardzens good faith estimate as of the date of publication and may be modified in the future The level of pay within the range will depend on a variety of jobrelated factors that may include location relevant prior experience andor education or particular skills and expertise Additional Information At Yardzen were committed to creating a space where our employees can bring their full selves to work and have equal opportunities to succeed We are looking for people that will add to our culture not just fit in So regardless of race gender identity or expression sexual orientation religion origin ability age or veteran status if joining this mission speaks to you we encourage you to apply Since April 2020 were a remotefirst organization We believe work is a thing you do not a place you go and we can stay connected as an organization from anywhere We believe that clearly defined goals combined with awesome people authentic empowerment and autonomy create the best results If you are an individual with a disability and would like to request a reasonable accommodation as part of the application or the recruiting process please contact us at recruitingyardzencom Yardzen is registered as an employer in many but not all states If you are not located in a state where Yardzen is registered you will not be eligible for employment See more

title: Staff Data Engineer
description: Our RD Team is seeking a Staff Data Engineer with deep expertise and experience in designing  building big data platforms including data modeling data warehousing data ingestion pipelines ETL data governance and cataloging The Staff Data Engineer will champion our data strategy and practices including tech stack choices the integration of our data platform with our products and the enablement of new AIbased capabilities as well as business intelligence for multiple stakeholders To be successful in this role they must have strong technical skills a proven track record of building large scale data platforms OUTCOMES Oversee 15Fives Data Engineering efforts Design build and maintain our realtime data platform enabling the ingestion and processing of large scale data in near real time Make tech stack choices and infrastructure related decisions that will support our mid and long term data needs and strategy taking into account flexibility and cost efficiency Design  champion our semantic data modeling to capture our data elements and in alignment with our business model and goals to enable extensibility and scalability Build and manage ETL processes to integrate external data sources and enable new  enriched datasets Champion data governance practices including data security sanitization retention policies BCDR and access controls Collaborate with data analysts and business stakeholders to enable integrations of data into reporting and BI services Collaborate with data scientists in building  enabling access to new datasets needed to run statistical analysis and train machine learning models Maintain data reliability high availability and accessibility COMPETENCIES Scope Skill and Execution Majority of time is focused on tactical efforts exhibit short and mediumterm thinking through issue identification and proposals with minimal supervision Able to design for flexibility efficiency and cost effectiveness Cognition  Scalability  Proactively and independently identifies issues root causes and maps out data needs to solve problems Has a demonstrated understanding of short and longterm impacts of problems and applies good judgment in prioritizing problems to solve Leadership Accountability  Eager to mentor others holds accountability for own decisions and acts as an informed participant in teamlevel decisions Works closely with manager to identify appropriate career progression and development objectives and seeks mentorship and guidance from experienced members of the team to further growth Communication  Influence  Independently forms crossteam discussions and directs deliverables deadlines and handoffs effectively Independently manages sources of crossteam tension and escalates when appropriate Shares suggests to improve 15Fives culture and supports others ideas contributes to an inclusive and effective environment for collaborating and ensures a sense of belonging for all teammates Customer  External Focus  Understand and articulate 15Fives position in the competitive landscape Represents 15Five and the brand well WHAT YOULL BRING A computer science degree or equivalent experience is required 8 years of experience as a data engineer or software engineer focusing on building data infrastructure solving complex technical challenges at a large scale and delivering data products that drive business impact Experience in architect develop deploy and manage a new endtoend data infrastructure leveraging cloud technologies that ingest data from a wide range of internal and external sources and enables APIbased or userfriendly consumption of data Experience in designing data architecture for multiple database models such as RDBMS document columnar graph and keyvalue data stores Expertise in both SQL and Python Proficiency in both SQL and NoSQL database technologies Proficiency in Data warehouses Data lakes and Data orchestration tools Proficiency in data modeling data sanitization and data security Experience in Data governance practices and Data discovery Wellverse in modern cloud native data tech stacks Experience with container tech such as Docker and Kubernetes Experience with data and ML orchestration tools Excellent communication and collaboration skills capable of working with different business partners and stakeholders Additional Information ABOUT 15FIVE 15Fives strategic performance management platform drives action and impact helping businesses and their people thrive Combining generative AI custom analytics and humancentered principles HR leaders can accelerate engagement performance and retention via 360 performance reviews engagement surveys goal tracking manager development and ongoing feedback tools like guided 1on1s and checkins At 15Five we focus on building a diverse team that prioritizes inclusivity and celebrates everyones unique identity We are proud of our thriving remotefirst culture balanced with annual opportunities for all employees to connect in person We also offer  Full Medical Dental and Vision Insurance  Flexible Time Off minimum 3 weeks off every year  Employer paid ShortTerm LongTerm Disability and Term Life  401K with 4 match at 6 months of employment  Inclusive Benefits Stipend to help cover some of the gap on medical needs not covered by traditional benefits  Up to 16 weeks Paid Parental Leave for birth and nonbirth parents  12 paid holidays in 2024  TalkSpace mental health therapy  Wellness Coach App offers meditation and movement classes courses workshops and panels in a live and interactive setting  Best Self Time 2 hours on Friday dedicated to your personal selfcareselfgrowthrecharge activities  Monthly reimbursement for internet  Sabbatical Program accessed at 5 or 7 Years  We also provide extensive training and development such as strengths discovery and alignment and Manager specific development opportunities Reading over the role description and feeling like you dont check every box Thats okay if you think you have what it takes but dont necessarily meet all the criteria please applyyou could be exactly who we are looking for 15Five follows equitable hiring practices Our compensation programs are designed to attract motivate and retain talented employees who are highly engaged high performing and have an exceptional impact on the business and our customers The base salary range displayed on each job posting reflects the minimum and maximum target for new hire salaries for the role across all US locations We benchmark all roles for compensation in ranges relative to the top half of the market of similar tech companies using uptodate market data Within the range individual pay is determined by budget allocated for the role and additional factors including jobrelated competencies and skills experience and relevant education or training Please note that the compensation details listed in US job postings reflect the base salary only and do not include bonus equity or benefits The US new hire base salary range for this fulltime role is 178500194000  bonus or commissions  equity  benefits Note that base salary ranges are reviewed each year based on uptodate market data and team members who are performing are eligible for a merit increase budget permitting In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire LIREMOTE LIJL1 See more

title: Product Marketing Manager, Accounting - Contract
description: Xero is a beautiful easytouse platform that helps small businesses and their accounting and bookkeeping advisors grow and thrive At Xero our purpose is to make life better for people in small business their advisors and communities around the world This purpose sits at the centre of everything we do We support our people to do the best work of their lives so that they can help small businesses succeed through better tools information and connections Because when they succeed they make a difference and when millions of small businesses are making a difference the world is a more beautiful place How youll make an impact Product Marketing at Xero is in an exciting and high growth phase We work closely with Product and gotomarket GTM teams across the business to bring a holistic view of customer needs to Product teams and translate these initiatives into customer value We do this to ensure we deliver maximum product value to customers as efficiently and effectively as possible In this role you will be the product marketing manager responsible for developing and growing our US tax and compliance accounting products which are essential tools for small businesses accountants and bookkeepers You will work closely with teams across Product including Product Management and Product Design to inform the product strategy by understanding the market competitive landscape and needs of priority customer segments You will also partner closely with US regional GTM teams including Marketing Sales Enablement Operations etc and be responsible for developing and executing the GTM strategy including positioning messaging etc of this product set to drive adoption with new and existing customers within the US What youll do You will be a key driver in assessing market opportunity and developing the Customer Value Proposition CVP for this product category Collaborate with Strategy Product Management Product Design and other stakeholders to undertake market competitor and customer research to deeply understand the market and opportunity in which we operate as well as customer needs and pain points Consolidate and communicate relevant insights which determine Xeros opportunity in the market You should integrate these insights into your product marketing plans Determine the target audience and segments in particular the Serviceable Available Market using insights from Product and Customer teams Lead a strategic and collaborative process to define the CVP for target audiences You will also identify and maintain compelling product evidence of CVPs Bring CVPs to life for internal audiences through assets such as messaging frameworks and product playbooks Ensure CVPs are regularly reviewed and updated in line with changes to customer competitors and product You will be the primary Product representative on GTM programs to ensure we release product efficiently and effectively Develop the GTM strategy for your products including defining the release plan marketing assets and timeline Collaborate with GTM teams and brief on product initiative to ensure execution aligns to strategy when communicating value externally Develop internal briefing assets and internal sales enablement resources to help enable and upskill internal teams This includes synthesizing market opportunity user insights competitive analysis CVP messaging and more Communicate product release to GTM stakeholders in a timely manner describing product value in customer terms You will lead the collaboration with GTM teams on product growth opportunities Identify opportunities to grow product adoption usage and retention  utilising research analytics and feedback  You will develop strategies and execute initiatives in collaboration with GTM teams to realize the opportunities you have identified Lead inproduct lifecycle marketing strategy and execution including inproduct communications You will be part of a Global Product team with peers located across our key regions eg UK Australia while focused primarily on growing Xeros presence in the US You will have the ability to travel if required Success looks like Strong working relationships with stakeholders that are built on trust and confidence Youll be effective at managing and influencing stakeholders to achieve specific outcomes Strong collaboration and communication skills with crossfunctional teams to achieve specific outcomes You will be part of a geographically dispersed team so collaborating and communicating regularly and effectively is key to your success You are a creative problem solver and solutionfocused You will independently tackle and manage complex and ambiguous problems and develop a recommended path forward before escalating if required A solid understanding of gotomarket processes New products features and experiences will be taken to market effectively by collaborating with Product and GTM stakeholders You have deep subject matter expertise for your product lines  including market customer and product knowledge  and are recognised as the goto expert for stakeholder enquiries Clear concise and compelling customer value propositions in market You have an unwavering focus on the customer and advocate for crossportfolio work where relevant GTM teams understand the value of your product and have the tools support and resources they need to deliver a great customer experience and to help grow product adoption usage and retention You are a datadriven strategist with strong analytical skills You develop insightled annual product marketing plans for your growth segmentsYou champion Product Marketing and work to become a strategic partner of Product You are deeply embedded in product pods throughout the product development lifecycle You are an autonomous and proactive worker who can independently lead programs and selfprioritize workload with minimal guidance required Customer and commercial targets are achieved or exceeded What youll bring with you Critical competencies Ability to think strategically work independently take initiative and execute effectively in a fast paced environment Creative problem solver who can manage ambiguity incorporate new learnings into existing plans and act decisively Commercial datadriven marketer with demonstrated experience building product strategies and GTM plans grounded in insights Passionate collaborator who thrives on regularly connecting with crossfunctional teams to work in unison towards a shared goal Strong communication analytical critical thinking and business strategy skills Exceptional ability to articulate compelling propositions in clear language and develop effective marketing materials Passion and desire to make a difference Experience 3 years in a product marketing marketing or GTM role preferably within a SaaS organization Experience working in an agile environment with Product Managers and development teams will help you succeed in this role Demonstrated experience in supporting development of product strategy and building new customer value propositions Demonstrated experience developing and executing an integrated gotomarket strategy and bringing a product to market Proven ability to communicate build strong relationships and manage senior stakeholders Additional Information Why Xero Diversity of people brings diversity of thought and we like that A collaborative and inclusive environment is important to us Working at Xero will provide you with a diverse and inclusive environment alongside people who will respect challenge and support you to have fun while you do the best work of your life We are a place where personal development flexible working innovation and wellbeing are not just inspired but celebrated We value our people and offer a wide range of compelling benefits and perks including Xero shares and great parental leave policies Xeros collaborative culture is underscored by our values  Ownership Challenge Beautiful Human and Team  which empower us to understand and serve customers attract top talent and continuously innovateFrom the moment you step through our doors youll feel welcome and supported to do the best work of your lifeAt Xero we embrace diversity and inclusion and value a challenge mindset Research has shown that women and underrepresented groups are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single competency or experience If you are excited about this role but your past experience doesnt align perfectly we encourage you to apply anyway You could be just the right person for this role and Xero If you have any support or access requirements we encourage you to advise us at time of application and throughout the interview process See more

title: Android Engineer - Freelance [Remote]

ESTIMATED DURATION 40hweek  Long term EXPERIENCE 510 years BRAINTRUST JOB ID 9474 THE OPPORTUNITY Requirements About The TeamRole We are looking for a Senior Android Engineer to join our App over the Buy on Etsy app and collaborate with many different squads This is a great team to join to build your skills in a supportive environment What youll be working on Requirements MustHaves At testing NicetoHaves A passion for beautiful code and quality development practices Are interested in monitoring the health and performance of the applications your team owns Have a leave it better than you found it mentality and are willing to work with and improve on code you did not originally write Experience with accessibility frameworks Experience designing RESTful APIs specifically optimized for mobile clients A knack for communicating complex technical issues in clear language Apply Now Notes Our employers all have varying legal and geographic requirements for their roles they trust Braintrust to find them the talent that meet their unique specifications For that reason this role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency If you are a professional contractor diverse workforce brings All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race national origin religion age color sex sexual orientation gender identity disability or protected veteran status See more

title: Americas Customer Support Lead

mobile networks designed to support their own customers needs Our TaaS solution combines multiple existing networks into one single platform that can be seamlessly managed in the cloud as a modern variation the internal organization structure and abiding by local regulations Additionally this position will partner with the Product team to plan for new product and feature releases by assessing years of total experience with 5 years in managing regional or global teams Ability to thrive in a fast pace and highly ambiguous environment in which competing priorities must be balanced Effective self starter capable of identifying an opportunity and capitalizing on it by driving a project through to completion Excellent communicator capable of distilling complex ideas into easily understood concepts and values Experience in launching or managing an outsourced BPO delivering customer facing services Previous experience with wireless or other telecommunication products or other high value subscription services highly desirable Multilingual with English and Spanish What We Offer Competitive salary and stock option incentive program Company contribution toward healthcare An enjoyable work environment OXIO has recently opened a new facility in Mexico City Flexible work arrangements Company sponsored teamlunches and company retreats International organization that enables you to work across boundaries travel to different locations and enjoy the dynamics of a rapidly growing startup A diverse and inclusive team We welcome applicants from all backgrounds to apply regardless of race ethnicity age disability status or other defining characteristics See more

title: Associate Growth Marketing Manager
description: Kikoff is a high growth consumer fintech startup offering creditbuilding solutions that are affordable accessible and educational Our core product the Kikoff Credit Account has helped over 1M customers build better credit Kikoff has been featured by Nerdwallet Forbes Buzzfeed and others and our app has a 49 rating amongst thousands of reviews But Kikoff is more than just a credit builder we are a longterm financial partner for our customers and we have an exciting product roadmap of solutions to help our customers reach their financial goals Were looking for a Associate Growth Marketing Manager to accelerate our user acquisition efforts by handson scaling up our current channels working with our inhouse creative team to systematically improve our creative performance and identify and test a myriad of new channels that will help unlock higher volume within our CACROAS goals Were looking for datadriven problem solvers with a growth mindset willing to stretch their comfort levels evolve best practices within growth marketing and move quickly with attention to detail to do big things Were looking for a thought leader to guide acquisition strategy and ideas who can execute quickly and methodically to shape our approach to growth We have an ambitious mission to educate folks about the importance of their credit scores  encourage them to unlock their financial access This is a fulltime position with benefits and equity in a fastmoving and fastgrowing environment that will help you grow your abilities and career as you help build a better ecosystem of credit for our customers What youll do Grow the number of users who join our program while keeping constant or improving our CACROAS Own campaigns handonkeyboard across two or more online and offline channels strategize and develop creative with our inhouse creative agency hypothesize and prioritize tests through the funnel and autonomously drive growth for the business Define drive and measure KPIs for each campaign Continually design and execute AB tests to make the most effective campaigns Work crossfunctionally to bring campaigns to life working with designers copywriters product team data analysts and more Who you are 23 years of a proven track record of driving towards growth goals under set CACROAS or volume targets timelines and budgets or a strong track record in an analytical academic discipline or structured and datadriven job Handson keys experience running digital paid channels such as Facebook TikTok SEM or others Ability to define key marketing KPIs and break them down into their underlying drivers to understand and influence performance from first principles Exhibits strong bias to action Moves fast and flexibly juggling multiple projects with the trustworthiness to execute on schedule at highvelocity and attentiontodetail Strategic thinker able to breakdown and organize problems assess opportunity areas and develop big ideas and priorities to move the business forward Understanding of hypothesis driven AB multivariate and incrementality testing with the ability to analyze test result data to tease out learnings and insights to inform future testing Understanding of what makes effective and strong direct response creative with a framework to keep adjusting and learning based on experimentation Experience in a fintech business or a D2C industry and SQL proficiency is a bonus Additional Information About Kikoff Kikoff is a personal finance platform designed to help millions of underserved Americans achieve financial wellness Our mission is to provide refreshingly fair effective and simple pathways for everyday people to meet their financial goals We design financial products that simplify credit building so our users can reach their financial goals Kikoff is a Series B company and has raised over 42 million in total funding Investors include Portage Ventures Lightspeed Venture Partners GGV Coatue Core Innovation Capital and basketball star Stephen Curry Kikoff was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in San Francisco with an office in Reno Why Kikoff This is a consumer fintech startup and you will be working with serial entrepreneurs who have built strong consumer brands and innovative products We are backed by some of Silicon Valleys top VCs We value extreme ownership clear communication a strong sense of craftsmanship and the desire to create lasting work and work relationships Yes you can build an exciting business AND have reallife realcustomer impact  Competitive pay based on experience  Medical dental and vision coverage  Kikoff covers the full cost of health insurance for the employee  Stock Options  Generous unlimited vacation policy to help you recharge Regular team building events to help you get to know the Kikoff team and soo much more Our last virtual cooking event had everyones mouth on fire but cooled down by homemixed cocktails Equal Employment Opportunity Statement Kikoff
